name: GpsGate-Server
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: GpsGate Server is a platform for web based GPS tracking of vehicles, valuable assets and persons. The modular GpsGate Server platform also allows you to configure, extend and customize applications to your needs.

matches.text: <input name="LoginControl$TextBoxPassword" type="password" id="LoginControl_TextBoxPassword" tabindex="2" class="form" onfocus="document.getElementById('LoginControl_TextBoxPassword').select()" value="password"
